name: Choice Coin
description: Choice Coin is a governance token and open source software for decentralized voting. Choice Coin is a digital asset used to solve the decentralized governance problem, referring to the complex process by which assets are allocated across decentralized networks. Choice Coin solves the decentralized governance problem by providing a mechanism by which decentralized organizations can vote securely using post-quantum cryptography. Embedded within the Choice Coin architecture is an AI software for ensuring regulatory compliance according to an algorithm for optimality
